existing_data.Title: Microsoft Might Face EU Probe Over Bing AI Safety Concerns
existing_data.Description: EU Commission investigates Bing's AI for safety risks like deepfakes, and manipulation. Microsoft risks fines for non-compliance.

existing_data.Title: A healthy PC means using Bing, according to Microsoft
existing_data.Description: Microsoft adds Bing as default search engine in an attempt to help clean up your PC.

existing_data.Title: Google Reveals Two New Web Crawlers
existing_data.Description: Google has added two new web crawlers: GoogleOther-Image and GoogleOther-Video.

existing_data.Title: ChatGPT To Surface Reddit Content Via Partnership With OpenAI
existing_data.Description: OpenAI and Reddit have partnered to bring Reddit content to ChatGPT.

existing_data.Title: Google Ads Restricts Brand Names & Logos From AI Image Generation
existing_data.Description: Google Ads has restricted the use of brand names and logos in AI image generation.

existing_data.Title: Google Hints At Improving Site Rankings In Next Update
existing_data.Description: Google aims to better reward high-quality content sites in the next core update.

existing_data.Title: Microsoft Under $2.1 Billion Fine From EU Over Bing AI Risks
existing_data.Description: Microsoft faces potential $2 billion fine from the EU over concerns about misinformation and manipulation risks from Bing's AI features like Copilot.

existing_data.Title: EU Commission gives Microsoft 10 days to hand over Bing AI documents
existing_data.Description: The European Commission on Friday gave Microsoft a legally binding deadline of May 27 to supply documents concerning the use of generative artificial intelligence (AI) in its Bing search engine. The order concerns two features: "Copilot in Bing," a multipurpose system that can create text and images based on prompts from the user, and "Image Creato...

existing_data.Title: YouTube Unveils New Content And Ad Offerings At Brandcast
existing_data.Description: YouTube is updating its YouTube Select program that packages top creators’ channels, adding creator takeovers and introducing a new AI-powered ad product.

existing_data.Title: TikTok now testing 60-minute video uploads
existing_data.Description: TikTok is testing longer video uploads as it continues to compete with YouTube.

existing_data.Title: Google adds two new Googlebot crawlers: GoogleOther-Image and GoogleOther-Video
existing_data.Description: Google said these new crawlers are to "better support crawling of binary data that may be used for research and development."

existing_data.Title: Former Bing AI Head, Mikhail Parakhin, Joins Perplexity Advisor Board
existing_data.Description: Mikhail Parakhin, the former head of Bing Search and Microsoft Advertising at Microsoft, has announced he is now on the advisory board for Perplexity. Perplexity is a new AI search start up, which technically would be in competition with Microsoft's Bing Search and Copilot.

existing_data.Title: Order with Google For Food Delivery Going Away End Of June
existing_data.Description: Order with Google integration with Uber Eats, Door Dash, GrubHub is going away at the end of June.

existing_data.Title: Google Ads AI Summaries Live For Some Advertisers
existing_data.Description: Google Ads AI summaries, which summarize campaign performance, are rolling out to some advertisers.

existing_data.Title: EU warns Microsoft to give Bing AI risk data or face fines
existing_data.Description: The EU on Friday told Microsoft to hand over internal documents or face fines as it examines generative AI risks on the company's search engine Bing ahead of elections.

existing_data.Title: Microsoft faces EU pressure but avoids UK probe
existing_data.Description: The EU wants info from Microsoft about Bing's generative AI features, while the UK has decided not to investigate its Mistral AI partnership.

existing_data.Title: Microsoft's Bing could face fine in EU if information on AI risks is not provided
existing_data.Description: Microsoft could face fines from the European Commission if it does not provide information on risks relating to generative AI in its search engine Bing.

existing_data.Title: EU warns Microsoft’s Bing could face probes over deepfakes and false news
existing_data.Description: Brussels suspects tech giant violated content moderation law.

existing_data.Title: AI search startup adds veterans of Google, Bing as advisers
existing_data.Description: The new advisors will include former Uber Technologies Inc. executive Emil Michael, Android co-founder and Google advisor Rich Miner, and Mikhail Parakhin, the former head of Microsoft Corp.’s Bing Search, the company said.

existing_data.Title: AI Startup Perplexity Adds Ex-Uber and Bing Execs as Advisers
existing_data.Description: AI startup Perplexity has added three new advisers: Emil Michael, Rich Miner and Mikhail Parakhin, who come from Uber, Google and Bing.

existing_data.Title: Microsoft PC Manager App 'Fixes' Your PC By Restoring Bing as the Default Search Engine
existing_data.Description: Gee, thanks Microsoft! We can't imagine how that setting got changed in the first place.

existing_data.Title: Microsoft lures users to improve their PCs by doing THIS
existing_data.Description: Bill Gates-founded American technology behemoth Microsoft attempted an innovative way to make people shift from Google to its search engine Bing, as the Redmond-based company continuously markets its products.

existing_data.Title: Microsoft's 4.5-rated performance optimization tool bizarrely recommends using Bing as the default search engine to 'repair' Windows 11
existing_data.Description: Microsoft PC Manager recommends using Bing as the default search engine to "repair" your Windows device.

existing_data.Title: Pushy Microsoft app wants you to "repair" your PC by switching to Bing
existing_data.Description: The PC Manager app has been kicking around the Microsoft Store since late 2022, but it's an optional download and not something that comes pre-installed with Windows...

existing_data.Title: Two New Googlebots: GoogleOther-Image & GoogleOther-Video
existing_data.Description: Google has added two new Googlebot user agents to its lineup: GoogleOther-Image and GoogleOther-Video.

existing_data.Title: Google Locks Down Complaints Of Image Thumbnails Not Showing In Search
existing_data.Description: Google has locked down the Google support thread with complaints about image thumbnails not showing in the search results, an ongoing issue for the past few months.

existing_data.Title: Google: Sites Hit By Helpful Content Update Could See Improvements With Next Core Update If...
existing_data.Description: Google's John Mueller was asked when can a site expect to recover from the September 2023 helpful content update, assuming the site took all measures to "fix" their site.

existing_data.Title: Is Service Areas A New Google Local Ranking Factor?
existing_data.Description: A bunch of local SEOs are buzzing about a possible new local SEO Google ranking factor and are looking to confirm it.

existing_data.Title: Google AdSense Will Not Change Minimum Reporting Thresholds
existing_data.Description: Google is not going to change the minimum reporting thresholds in Google AdSense.

existing_data.Title: Many Searchers Want To Turn Off Google AI Overviews
existing_data.Description: Searchers are complaining in the Google Search help forums that they want to turn off the new Google AI Overviews.

existing_data.Title: Continued Heated Google Search Ranking Volatility Through May 16th
existing_data.Description: The May 9th Google ranking volatility is super unusual to see such heated volatility for such a long period within the Google Search rankings.

existing_data.Title: Google Local Service Ads Tests Message Multiple Businesses
existing_data.Description: Google is testing a "message multiple businesses" button in the Google Local Service Ads search results.

existing_data.Title: OpenAI and Reddit partner to bring Reddit content to ChatGPT
existing_data.Description: OpenAI and Reddit partner to bring Reddit content to ChatGPT and more via Reddit's Data API, bring new AI tools to Reddit, and make OpenAI a Reddit ad partner.

existing_data.Title: EU tells Microsoft to provide information on GenAI risks in Bing search else face fine
existing_data.Description: The European Commission on Friday directed Microsoft to provide more information about the generative AI (GenAI) features in its search engine Bing else face fine, as the tech giant failed to respond to a March 14 request for inputs regarding specific risks stemming from Bing's GenAI features.

existing_data.Title: Microsoft PC Manager App 'Repairs' Your System by Making Bing the Search Default
existing_data.Description: PC Manager will sneakily try to change the Edge browser's default search to Bing if it's been set to a third-party search engine such as Google.

existing_data.Title: Google adds two new Googlebot crawlers: GoogleOther-Image and GoogleOther-Video
existing_data.Description: Google adds two new Googlebot crawlers: GoogleOther-Image and GoogleOther-Video

existing_data.Title: AI Search Startup Adds Veterans of Google, Bing as Advisers
existing_data.Description: Perplexity’s new advisory board includes ex-executives from its biggest competitors.

existing_data.Title: Netflix ads tier hits 40 million subscribers
existing_data.Description: Netflix says its ad tier has 40M MAUs, up from 23M in January 2024, and plans to launch its own ad platform and no longer partner with Microsoft for that tech

existing_data.Title: TikTok tests 60-minute video uploads as it continues to take on YouTube
existing_data.Description: TikTok tests 60-minute video uploads as it continues to take on YouTube

existing_data.Title: Women in Tech SEO Festival Returns to Philadelphia: A Day of Insightful Discussions Await
existing_data.Description: PHILADELPHIA, PA — The highly anticipated Women in Tech SEO Festival is poised to make a grand return to Philadelphia on Thursday, September 19th, 2024. Organized by Women in Tech …

existing_data.Title: EU demands clarity from Microsoft on AI risks in Bing
existing_data.Description: The European Commission could fine Microsoft if it doesn't provide adequate information on risks stemming from generative AI features in search engine Bing by May 27.

existing_data.Title: Microsoft Rewards expands to all 7 continents with new streak restore and protection capabilities — Oh, you can learn a new language for free for using Bing on Edge, too
existing_data.Description: Microsoft Rewards expands to new regions with new daily streak bonus capabilities.

existing_data.Title: Google, GenAI and Search: How Marketers Can Prepare for the Changing SEO Landscape
existing_data.Description: How genAI is transforming the way we search, strategies that organizations can use to create LLM-friendly content and insights on how genAI will continue to transform the marketing landscape.

existing_data.Title: Pi Datametrics, Lumar team up to unify technical & search intelligence
existing_data.Description: Enterprise Search Intelligence and SEO platform Pi Datametrics announced a data exchange partnership with recognized leader in technical SEO solutions, Lumar

existing_data.Title: Securing Email Addresses for Abandoned Carts
existing_data.Description: A series of emails can often recover sales from abandoned carts, but only if a shopper provides an email address.

existing_data.Title: Search Engine Marketing (SEM) Costs in 2024
existing_data.Description: Typical SEM costs include the cost of any tools or platforms you use, landing page development, employee salaries, Cost Per Click (CPC) payments, and any content creation costs.

existing_data.Title: Microsoft faces multi-billion dollar fine in EU over Bing AI
existing_data.Description: Microsoft faces a May 27 deadline to respond to a European Commission request for information concerning its Bing artificial intelligence services else it faces a multi-billion dollar fine.

existing_data.Title: Perplexity CEO calls Google’s AI search a mess
existing_data.Description: Perplexity CEO Aravind Srinivas: Google’s AI search is a mess “That’s what it looks like when you have an SGE answer. There’s ads, there’s panels, there’s links, all sorts of things in one single UI; it’s pretty complicated.”

existing_data.Title: OpenAI dissolves team focused on long-term AI risks
existing_data.Description: OpenAI’s Superalignment team, announced in 2023, has been working to achieve…

existing_data.Title: Google AI Overviews inclusion are now visible in Semrush sensor
existing_data.Description: Google AI Overviews inclusion are now visible in Semrush sensor, shown to be included only in 0.4% of the overall tracked desktop SERPs and 0.57% of mobile ones in the US.

existing_data.Title: About 38% of webpages that existed in 2013 are unavailable now
existing_data.Description: About 38% of webpages that existed in 2013 are unavailable now and 8% of pages from 2023 are unavailable; 23% of news pages have at least one broken link

existing_data.Title: Remove Your Content From Google's AI Overviews
existing_data.Description: Google explained that 'preview controls' can be used to remove content from AI Overviews. These controls include nosnippet, noarchive, and unavailable_after.

existing_data.Title: Reddit partners with OpenAI
existing_data.Description: OpenAI and Reddit partner to bring Reddit content to ChatGPT and more via Reddit's Data API, bring new AI tools to Reddit, and make OpenAI a Reddit ad partner

existing_data.Title: New tool to track your Google's AI Overviews Inclusion: ZipTie
existing_data.Description: A new tool called ZipTie has been released that allows users to track their website's inclusion in Google's AI Overviews. The tool offers a 14-day free trial.

existing_data.Title: Semrush Now Provides Data on Google AI Overviews Inclusion
existing_data.Description: Semrush has started providing data on Google AI Overviews inclusion in its reporting and position tracking tool.

existing_data.Title: Perplexity CEO Calls Google’s AI Search a Mess
existing_data.Description: Perplexity CEO Aravind Srinivas has criticized Google's AI search, calling it a mess due to its complicated UI with ads, panels, and links.

existing_data.Title: LinkedIn's Collaborative Articles Impacted by Google's Helpful Content System
existing_data.Description: LinkedIn's collaborative articles, which often begin with AI-generated content, have been negatively impacted by Google's helpful content system.

existing_data.Title: Slack Confirms Training Some AI-Powered Features on User Content
existing_data.Description: Slack has confirmed that it is training some of its AI-powered features, but not its generative AI tool, on user content and uploads, with all users opted-in by default.

existing_data.Title: Sony Music Issues Warnings to AI Companies Over Unauthorized Use of Content
existing_data.Description: Sony Music has sent letters to over 700 AI companies, developers, and music streaming platforms warning them against the unauthorized use of Sony's content in training AI.

existing_data.Title: OpenAI and Reddit Partner to Bring Reddit Content to ChatGPT
existing_data.Description: OpenAI and Reddit have partnered to bring Reddit content to ChatGPT and other AI tools. The partnership also includes making OpenAI a Reddit ad partner.

existing_data.Title: Google Adds Two New Googlebot Crawlers: GoogleOther-Image & GoogleOther-Video
existing_data.Description: Google has added two new Googlebot crawlers: GoogleOther-Image and GoogleOther-Video. These crawlers are specifically designed for crawling images and videos.

existing_data.Title: Google Locks Down Support Thread on Image Thumbnails Not Showing in Search Results
existing_data.Description: Google has locked down a support thread on its forum where users were complaining about image thumbnails not showing in search results. The company acknowledged the issue but said it couldn't reply to specifics.

existing_data.Title: Former Bing AI Head Joins Perplexity Advisory Board
existing_data.Description: Mikhail Parakhin, the former head of Bing Search, AI, and Ads, has joined the advisory board of AI search engine Perplexity.

existing_data.Title: EU Gives Microsoft 10 Days to Provide Information on Bing's AI Risks or Face Fines
existing_data.Description: The European Commission has given Microsoft 10 days to provide information on the risks associated with Bing's generative AI features or face fines of up to 6% of its global income.

existing_data.Title: Microsoft PC Manager App Recommends Using Bing as Default Search Engine
existing_data.Description: Microsoft's PC Manager app is recommending users to switch to Bing as their default search engine as part of its system optimization recommendations.

existing_data.Title: Google Adds New AI Overviews Documentation to Search Console
existing_data.Description: Google has added new documentation about AI Overviews to Google Search Console. The documentation explains when and why AI Overviews appear in search results.

existing_data.Title: Google Ads AI Summaries Rolling Out to Advertisers
existing_data.Description: Google Ads AI summaries, which provide summarized insights into campaign performance, are reportedly rolling out to advertisers.
